attributes.action: Remove Britain from the EU, permanently
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Remove our country from the undemocratic, and unvoted for, European Union. It has no place in Britain, it is controlling in speech and actions, with things that are none of it's business, not now, not ever. Virtually not ONE, of the so-called EU's laws, are made by Britain. Basically, I believe the majority of the public want out of it, NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
